mapper.insert: insert into db_product_title (SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTIME, FILED1, FILED4, FILED5, TITLE, SID, QTY, FILED2, FILED3) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{filed5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{filed2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{filed3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_product_title set OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FILED1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILED4 = #{filed4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FILED5 = #{filed5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, SID = #{sid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FILED2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FILED3 = #{filed3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTIME, FILED1, FILED4, FILED5, TITLE, SID, QTY, FILED2, FILED3 from db_product_title where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTIME, FILED1, FILED4, FILED5, TITLE, SID, QTY, FILED2, FILED3 from db_product_title
